name: BabysitterQuestion
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ready answering questions
des: With this skill and Amazon Echodot, you can interact with Amazon Sumerian Hosts in Virtual Reality. For example, when the host ask you "How much water will be in the milk bottle?" ,you can pass your answer "one hundred twenty" as voice into Amazon Sumerian by Amazon Echodot.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
